description: Detects execution of the SharpLDAPmonitor. Which can monitor the creation, deletion and changes to LDAP objects.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - SharpLDAPmonitor Execution
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\SharpLDAPmonitor.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"SharpLDAPmonitor.exe"))) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\/user\:*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/pass\:*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/dcip\:*")))
